answers.answer: How high is your blood pressure? With my first baby I had pregnancy induced hyper tension or preeclampsia I went to a doctors appointment and my blood was high so my doctor sent me immediately to the hospital and it wasn't going down while I was there I had just turned 36 weeks they wanted to wait till I was 37 but my bp wasn't going down so they induced me. I ended up getting a c section cause I wouldn't dilate past 5 cm.
I don't quite remember he said I'm 135 over something he said I had prehypertension n my feet swollen but no protein in my urine.

question: I'm 36 wks. I haven't been able to eat and he lil stuff I eat like soup and crackers I throw back up. I'm able to keep fluids down. I told my obgyn about this today he suggest I keep drinking fluids. I'm also experiencing high BP. my obgyn said he will monitor it for the next couple weeks and isn't recommended inducing me cuz I haven't dilated has anyone else been thru this. I be hungry but hate that I can't eat even the thought of food makes me sick to stomach.
title: Food wud b nice
